issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* When attempting to modify the attributes of a given load balancer, the following error was returned when the ELB was not passed: {code} [root@a-18 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes AccessLog.Enabled=True AccessLog.S3BucketName=nginx-access-logs AccessLog.EmitInterval=5 AccessLog.S3BucketPrefix=nginx-access --region devops-admin@region-1 eulb-modify-lb-attributes: error (400 Bad Request): elasticloadbalancing_amazonaws_com_doc_2012_06_01 failed to marshall type com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.common.msgs.ModifyLoadBalancerAttributesType with ns:http://elasticloadbalancing.amazonaws.com/doc/2012-06-01/ caused by: null value for element "{http://elasticloadbalancing.amazonaws.com/doc/2012-06-01/}Enabled" from object of type com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.common.msgs.AccessLog {code} This may be both a tools and API issue. *Signs* Debug output below: {code} [root@a-18 ~]# eulb-modify-lb-attributes AccessLog.Enabled=True AccessLog.S3BucketName=nginx-access-logs AccessLog.EmitInterval=5 AccessLog.S3BucketPrefix=nginx-access --region devops-admin@region-1 --debug 2015-10-01 13:28:25,782 DEBUG ModifyLoadBalancerAttributes parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': 'devops-admin@region-1', 'attrs': [{'AccessLog.S3BucketName': 'nginx-access-logs'}, {'AccessLog.EmitInterval': '5'}, {'AccessLog.S3BucketPrefix': 'nginx-access'}], 'LoadBalancerName': 'AccessLog.Enabled=True', 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2015-10-01 13:28:25,783 INFO Config finding region option elasticloadbalancing-url 2015-10-01 13:28:25,783 DEBUG Config section region-1 2015-10-01 13:28:25,783 INFO Config found region-1::elasticloadbalancing-url = 'http://loadbalancing.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/' 2015-10-01 13:28:25,783 INFO Config finding region option name 2015-10-01 13:28:25,783 DEBUG Config section region-1 2015-10-01 13:28:25,784 INFO Config found region-1::name = 'region-1' 2015-10-01 13:28:25,784 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-10-01 13:28:25,784 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-10-01 13:28:25,784 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-10-01 13:28:25,784 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-10-01 13:28:25,785 INFO Config finding region option verify-ssl 2015-10-01 13:28:25,785 DEBUG Config section region-1 2015-10-01 13:28:25,785 DEBUG Config section * 2015-10-01 13:28:25,785 INFO Config novalue for verify-ssl 2015-10-01 13:28:25,785 INFO Config finding user option key-id 2015-10-01 13:28:25,786 DEBUG Config section devops-admin 2015-10-01 13:28:25,786 INFO Config found devops-admin::key-id = 'AKIAA427RQSJWZ5DGKYE' 2015-10-01 13:28:25,786 INFO Config comments.body: [~spark], please follow up with a tool bugs, to be filed.
The tools bug is filed: TOOLS-600.
